definitions.definition: The quality or state of being radiant ; shining, bright or splendid.
The flux of radiation emitted per unit solid angle in a given direction by a unit area of a source.

main_definition: The quality or state of being radiant ; shining, bright or splendid.
secondary_definitions: ( physics ) The flux of radiation emitted per unit solid angle in a given direction by a unit area of a source.
